name: FireFall (itch)
description:
In this game  the player uses simple controls (<- & -> Keys or A & D Keys) to move their character back and forth across the ground.

Fireballs will fall from the sky, and the player attempts to avoid them for as long as possible.

The player can choose between 2 game modes: Normal, and Hard. The player can also choose whether there are 2 players, or just 1 player.

See how far you can get!   ;)
